mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders values( order_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{productQuantity}, #{usedPoint}, #{basicAddr}, #{detailAddr}, #{paymentMethod}, sysdate, #{deliveryCharge}, #{price}, 1 )
INSERT INTO order_detail values( order_detail_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #{productCode}, #{orderNo}, (SELECT price FROM product WHERE product_code = #{productCode}), #{productQuantity} )
mapper.select: SELECT order_no, user_no, product_quantity, used_point, basic_addr, detail_addr, payment_method, order_date, delivery_charge, price, order_status FROM orders WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY order_no DESC
SELECT order_detail_no, product_code, order_no, order_detail_price, order_detail_quantity FROM order_detail WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}

SELECT TO_CHAR(A.order_date, 'MM') AS month, SUM(A.product_quantity) AS sales FROM (SELECT * FROM orders WHERE extract(year from order_date) = extract(year from sysdate)) A GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.order_date, 'MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(A.order_date, 'MM')
select * from( select b.name, count(*) cnt from order_detail a inner join product b on a.product_code = b.product_code group by b.name order by cnt desc ) where rownum <= 3
